doc:
Loretta Abbott https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loretta_Abbott 0 Loretta Agatha Abbott (1933 – 2016) was an American educator, dancer, choreographer, singer, director, dance captain, and actress. She was an early member and foundation builder for the Alvin Ailey Dance Company. She was also a founding member of the Clark Center for the Performing Arts, and worked with the organization from 1959 to 1989. Loretta_Agatha_Abbott ( 1933 – 2016 ) was an_American_educator , dancer , choreographer , singer , director , dance_captain , and actress . She was an_early_member_and_foundation_builder for the_Alvin_Ailey_Dance_Company . She was also a_founding_member of the_Clark_Center for the_Performing_Arts , and worked with the_organization from 1959 to 1989 .
